constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 194 (Thursday, November 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MRVAN:
H.R. 5877.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H6208]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Pension Risk Transfer Accountability Act of 2021
